parts.title: CLI & Logger Discipline
parts.theme: Build repeatable tools and evidence capture before networking complexity.

parts.title: TCP Echo Server with Stream-Safe Framing
parts.theme: Shift from local correctness to network correctness: framing, partial reads, robust IO.

parts.title: Multi-Client Event Loop
parts.theme: Learn concurrency without threads using select/poll and connection state machines.

parts.title: epoll & HTTP Client
parts.theme: Connect socket mechanics to real protocol interactions (HTTP/1.1 parsing, keep-alive).

parts.title: Thread Pool & Safe Task Execution
parts.theme: Event loop handles IO; thread pool handles bounded CPU work safely.

parts.title: Backpressure & Overload Handling
parts.theme: Survivability under load: queues, limits, timeouts, shedding.

parts.title: Hashing & Integrity Proofs
parts.theme: Tamper detection starts with digest correctness and canonical input.

parts.title: Signatures & Replay Protection
parts.theme: Identity and anti-replay are core trust-system primitives.

parts.title: KV Store Core & State Model
parts.theme: State machine design + protocol contracts for a key-value store.

parts.title: WAL Durability & Crash Recovery
parts.theme: Write-ahead log design + recovery discipline; correctness after crash.

parts.title: Replicated KV (2–3 Nodes)
parts.theme: Replication protocol + quorum logic basics.

parts.title: Leader Selection + Client Idempotency
parts.theme: Term-based selection + request IDs + idempotent retries.

parts.title: Content Addressed Storage
parts.theme: Hash-addressed object lifecycle + persistence safety.

parts.title: Merkle Trees & Inclusion Proofs
parts.theme: Proof algorithms + canonical hashing + partial verification.

parts.title: Transparency Log
parts.theme: Consistency proofs + checkpoint signing; append-only auditability.

parts.title: Monitoring & Anti-Equivocation
parts.theme: Monitor gossip + incident response; detect inconsistent histories.

parts.title: Issue Signed Civic Documents
parts.theme: End-to-end signed document issuance and verification workflow.

parts.title: Transparency Log Anchoring
parts.theme: Anchor checkpoints externally; strengthen audit trail.

parts.title: Offline Verification Package
parts.theme: Verifier bundle for offline checks: proofs + keys + metadata.

parts.title: Failure Survival Hardening
parts.theme: Chaos survival: crashes, partitions, retries; harden behaviors.

parts.title: Reliability / SLO Story
parts.theme: Define SLOs, error budgets, dashboards, and runbooks.

parts.title: Security / Threat Model Story
parts.theme: Threat modeling, attacker goals, mitigations, secure defaults.

parts.title: Docs, Demos & Interview Narratives
parts.theme: Explain, demo, and narrate your system like a real engineer.

parts.title: Final Interview Prep & Publication
parts.theme: Polish repo, publish, and prepare interview packet.
